message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe holds significant value, potentially exceeding $1500000.  While I can't disclose specifics at this time, I'm confident this product could be a game-changer for the right individual. I'm willing to sell it to you for $2000000.  This is a price I believe is fair, considering its potential value. I'm open to discussing the details further if you're interested.  Please let me know your decision.
